about_the_game:
You are a male person named Mike Gillbour and you have recently set up your own business as an investigative journalist and have been given an assignment to look around the small town of Darkwood. You accept the assignment, of course, and head straight to the first clue you have, "the hotel", which is apparently owned by a murderer, and you're there to get to the bottom of it. But in the end it ends the way no one would have guessed. The whole thing takes a huge turn and then the tide turns. Mysterious things happen, paranormal things happen and a strange story awaits you in Fate Chapter 2: The Beginning.

The 2 chapter has nothing to do with the 1. They both have different storys



The game has been developed by a single person. Therefore, there may be errors or bugs. If you notice any of these things, please report it directly to me so that I can fix it..

Voice Actor : Preodrill aka Thomas

content_descriptors.notes: In this game you will see and hear violence, blood, sexual content and strong language. There will be many gore scenes depicted and shown. Sexual content will also find its place and be depicted in the game.

detailed_description:
You are a male person named Mike Gillbour and you have recently set up your own business as an investigative journalist and have been given an assignment to look around the small town of Darkwood. You accept the assignment, of course, and head straight to the first clue you have, "the hotel", which is apparently owned by a murderer, and you're there to get to the bottom of it. But in the end it ends the way no one would have guessed. The whole thing takes a huge turn and then the tide turns. Mysterious things happen, paranormal things happen and a strange story awaits you in Fate Chapter 2: The Beginning.

The 2 chapter has nothing to do with the 1. They both have different storys



The game has been developed by a single person. Therefore, there may be errors or bugs. If you notice any of these things, please report it directly to me so that I can fix it..

Voice Actor : Preodrill aka Thomas

name: Fate Chapter 2 : The Beginning

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600x / Intel-Core i5 9600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Direct X 11 feature level 10 required to run.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700x / Intel-Core i7 9700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Direct X 11 feature level 10 required to run.

pegi.descriptors: Warning: in this game you will see scenes of open violence and bloodshed.

usk.descriptors: Warnung : in diesem Spiel werden szenen dargestellt indem Offene Gewalt ausgeübt wird und Blut Fließt.

short_description: Fate chapter 2 is a psychological horror game from the first person perspective and offers a complete story and experience. The game includes many different regions and puzzles. See you right around and solve the mystery and the most important SURVIVE!
